item.title: Xurses [Hiring] - closed
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Still looking.

Rules of server:

(1). No swearing, Your staff make an off account if you need to and Ill mute it.
(2). Be respectful and helpful to other players once they start generating
(3).Make a forum username
(4).Dont do anything like spamming or yelling at someone, be the bigger person.
(5). Get along with other staff.

Read full topic
